meta.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 31
meta.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the final week of July 2021

pageProps.content:
• Found a great blog on Naval Architecture by Bartosz Ciechanowski. His blogs are always well written and detailed with informative images.
  • Evil tip: avoid "easy" things.
  • 5000x faster CRDTs: An Adventure in Optimization.
  • Trophallaxis - Trophallaxis is the transfer of food or other fluids among members of a community through mouth-to-mouth or anus-to-mouth feeding. Weired thing I learned from an instagram page.
